mbuild.plugins.parameterize package¶

Submodules¶

mbuild.plugins.parameterize.topolbuild module¶

mbuild.plugins.parameterize.topolbuild.topolbuild(traj, forcefield, charge=False, mol2_name='traj.mol2', top_name='traj.top')[source]¶

Use topolgen to apply the OPLS-aa forcefield to a .pdb file.

Parameters:
  • traj (md.Trajectory) – The trajectory to parameterize
  • top_name (str, optional) – Rename the output .top file to something other than the default ‘ffoplsaa_TopolGen_.top’

mbuild.plugins.parameterize.topolgen module¶

mbuild.plugins.parameterize.topolgen.topolgen(traj, pdb_name='traj.pdb', top_name='traj.top')[source]¶

Use topolgen to apply the OPLS-aa forcefield to a .pdb file.

Parameters:
  • traj (md.Trajectory) – The trajectory to parameterize
  • top_name (str, optional) – Rename the output .top file to something other than the default ‘ffoplsaa_TopolGen_.top’
